text: Boisjean is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== A small village situated some 4 miles(6 km) south of Montreuil-sur-Mer at the D139 and D142 crossroads. ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Boisjean
